results.name: Triangle read by rows, first n terms of the sequence (1, 2, 4, 10, ...) followed by P(n), where (2, 4, 10, 12, ...) = twice Pell numbers.
comment: Row sums = A000129(n), the Pell numbers: (1, 2, 5, 12, ...).
